title: Trickery Domain
content: ne of existence. 2 Turns 18m CHASave Concentration DEATH WARD Lv 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Protect a creature from death. The next time damage would reduce it to 0 hit points, it remains conscious with 1 hit point left. Until Long Rest Melee DIMENSION DOOR Lv 4 Conjuration Action Teleport yourself and up to 1 adjacent ally to a place you can see. The ally cannot be larger than medium. Melee FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT Lv 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Snap an ally out of any Stun. Dif
